item.title: Experience the Singapore F1 promotion at BIG Hotel
item.description:
Source: BIG Hotel. Travelers can take advantage of a Formula One promotion at Singapore’s BIG Hotel. Bookings made by September 12th will receive a 10% discount on room rates, complimentary Wi-Fi throughout their stay, and access to free on-demand movies. This offer is valid for stays during the F1 night race in Singapore, from September 18th to 21st. The hotel is conveniently situated on Middle Road, a short distance from Bras Basah station...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-the-singapore-f1-promotion-at-big-hotel/
